author: CTPPS
body:
This PR is the backport of #24213 that introduces a better visualization for HPTDC errors, organizing them per Digitizer Board (DB) and TDC.
Moreover, we add few cosmetic fixes and:

test file to run the DQM locally using dat files
fix for ctpps_dqm_sourceclient-live_cfg.py to introduce the use of onlineMetaDataDigis
Thanks
@forthommel @dfigueiredo
title: PPS Timing Diamond: DQM update; backport of #24213
